name: Atmo's Climb
description:
Atmo's Climb is a platform jumping game where you play as Atmo, a robot that wants to ascend as high as possible! Jump from platform to platform while collecting coins and powerups, and try to get the highest score.

The 'freeze' powerup freezes the camera for a set amount of time, and the 'superjump' powerup allows Atmo to jump higher temporarily.

Controls

Control Atmo using the a and d keys, jump by pressing space. Moving faster horizontally will give Atmo a jump boost.

Sound effects can be enabled & disabled by pressing S on the title-screen.
